title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
### KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat

**Product Overview:**
Experience the perfect blend of functionality and convenience with the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat. Designed for small spaces, this versatile heater is ideal for homes, dorms, offices, and kitchens. With its sleek, black design and compact size, it fits seamlessly into any room while providing efficient and quiet heat.

**Power Options:**
- **Low Heat Mode:** 750W – Perfect for gentle warming.
- **High Heat Mode:** 1500W – Offers rapid and powerful heating.
- **Fan Mode:** Enhances air circulation for a more comfortable environment.

**Safety Features:**
- **Overheat Protection:** Ensures your safety with automatic shutdown when temperatures get too high.
- **Tip-Over Protection:** Automatically turns off the heater if it is tipped over at an angle of 45 degrees.

**Dimensions & Weight:**
- **Dimensions:** 7.72 inches (width) x 6.38 inches (depth) x 9.13 inches (height)
- **Weight:** 2.6 pounds

**Certifications:**
- **ETL Certified:** Meets strict safety standards.

**Ideal Use Cases:**
- Home
- Dorm
- Office
- Kitchen

**Additional Features:**
- **Intuitive Controls:** Easy to use and understand.
- **Thermostat:** Precisely control the temperature.
- **Portable:** Designed for easy movement.
- **Quick Heating:** Heats up to 200 square feet in just 2 seconds.
- **Low Thermal Resistance:** Ensures even heat distribution.
- **Quiet Operation:** Operates at a noise level below 45 dB.

**Heating Element:**
- **PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient):** Ensures efficient and reliable heating.

**Coverage Area:**
- Ideal for areas up to 200 square feet.

**Why Choose KISSAIR:**
- **Efficiency:** Rapid heat generation with minimal energy consumption.
- **Convenience:** Compact and portable design.
- **Safety:** Advanced safety features to keep you and your belongings secure.
- **Comfort:** Quiet operation and even heat distribution.

**Order Now and Experience the Perfect Blend of Warmth and Convenience!**
